thread.title: Senior NT Government staffer charged with corruption
thread.title_full: Senior NT Government staffer charged with corruption

title: Senior NT Government staffer charged with corruption
text:
Senior NT Government staffer charged ... Senior NT Government staffer charged with corruption Next Story Prev Story 2 hrs ago Read more: ABC News 
Paul Mossman, the chief of staff of Northern Territory minister Bess Price, and former chairwoman of the Territory's branch of Crime Stoppers Xana Kamitsis have been charged with corruption. It comes after Kamitsis was indicted this morning at the NT Supreme Court on 37 charges including multiple accounts of stealing money from the Northern Territory.   ABC News.
